item1.lore:
Cobblestone Minion XII
&7Place this minion and it will start
&7generating and mining Cobblestone!
&7Requires an open area to place
&7Cobblestone. Minions also work when
&7you are offline!

&7Time Between Actions: &a6s
&7Max Storage: &e960
&7Resources Generated: &b0

&9&lRARE&r

&7Cost
&9Cobblestone Minion XI
&aEnchanted Cobblestone &8x1024
&62,000,000 Coins
